title: Mini-Ep 67: Thank You Notes and Shoulder Stress
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 67: Thank You Notes and Shoulder Stress
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree receive several suggestions for easing tense shoulders, discuss the idea of Thank You Note Forgiveness Day, hear from a Zumba lover who’s embracing not caring what others think, and lend advice to a listener contemplating leaving life in...
description:
Kate and Doree receive several suggestions for easing tense shoulders, discuss the idea of Thank You Note Forgiveness Day, hear from a Zumba lover who’s embracing not caring what others think, and lend advice to a listener contemplating leaving life in the big city to move back home.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • The Art of Racing In The Rain - Pre-sale starts July 25th. In theaters August 9th.
  • FIGS - For 15% your first order, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER.
  • Buffy - For $20 off your Buffy comforter, visit Buffy.co and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • LOLA - To save 40% off your first month’s subscription, go to mylola.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • BirchBox - Get $5 off your first BirchBox when you go to birchbox.com/forever35 and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • Frank & Oak - Head to frankandoak.com/forever35 to try Style Plan and get $25 off your first subscription box.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
